headline: Will Citi’s (C) Leadership Shuffle and Reorg Cement Confidence in Its Efficiency Drive?
summary: Citigroup recently announced a series of executive transitions and business reorganizations, including the appointment of Gonzalo Luchetti as CFO beginning in March 2026, and the integration of its Retail Bank into the Wealth business, alongside the merger of Branded Cards and Retail Services into U.S. Consumer Cards. These moves are part of Citi’s ongoing efforts to streamline its operations and position itself for greater efficiency and growth under CEO Jane Fraser’s leadership. An...
